Text:

Nice try with the ps3 compatible in all your titles but it's bollox!

@blusniffer
 I'm not sure why you feel the need to comment here, unless its to prove that you are an extremely moronic individual who made himself a piratebay account just so he can post annoying ass dumb-fuck comments like that. 
 I upload pre-muxed tv shows and movies, most of which are incompatible to be played on a PS3 system because they are .mkv or otherwise not capable of play. 
 So, if you could just tell me how many times your dumb shit whore-slut of a mother dropped you on your head and then stuck your head in her filthy cunt to deprive you of oxygen while shoving your dads cock up your ass, then I will know exactly how and why you are so stupid and retarded, possibly the most so of any human being I have ever met in my entire life. 
 Scum like you needs to be erased.

Oh my god dude, you are such a freaking loser. If you don't want the torrent don't download it, ok?

And I'm trying to take down my Battle Los Angeles because it doesn't work. At least I can admit it, asshole. And so far like 400 people have downloaded my torrents. The other people that comment on my uploads seem to know what they are talking about and understand what I'm doing. 
You call me a reuploader like its an insult, if that's what I was doing I'd be proud of that too, but I dare you to find files like these anywhere else. 
To close, please go die.

Holy shit, your an awesome uploader! Just for that, I will take your comment more seriously, although just to defend myself, I'm from the dirty D and that's pretty much our general language around here. So if you say something that I find insulting, the general result is usually something along those lines.
...it says Darth in the name for a reason...

Lol, sorry, Detroit, Michigan. I was just hanging out with a few of my friends last night and was noticing the language we were using was almost exactly along the lines of what I wrote here. Cultural norms and whatnot I guess. I don't care, I learned my lesson, I'm just gonna post my torrents and keep to myself.
